title: Chain Analysis Complete

interventionPoints.title: Intervention Points
interventionPoints.description: Look for places in your chain where you could use DBT skills:

points.label: Initial thoughts:
points.skill: Use Check the Facts or Wise Mind

points.label: Urges to act:
points.skill: Use STOP or Distress Tolerance skills

description: Think of a recent situation where you acted in a way you'd like to change. This could be an argument, an impulsive decision, or any behavior you want to understand better.

nextSteps.title: Next Steps
nextSteps.description: Consider which DBT skills you could practice to interrupt this chain in the future. Remember, Chain Analysis is about learning, not self-criticism.
